body.headline: Hit the ground running with Sveltekit, Typescript, Tailwind, and Pug
body.text: The SkinnyPug project is an open source starter template for Node projects using SvelteKit, Typescript, TailwindCSS, and Pug. Designed to help get you up and running quickly with the SkinnyPug Stack.

meta.description: A node starter template for the Svelte, Typescript, TailwindCSS, and Pug stack.
meta.title: Svelte + Pug | Starter Template
